articles.title: Lewandowski: Trump questioning staff after GOP midterm losses
articles.description: "The president went, I think, from a victory that night to now coming to a realization that the House is not where he wanted it to be," Corey Lewandowski tells Chuck on MTP Daily.

articles.title: Congratulations to the NBC News Capitol Hill team!
articles.description: The NBC News Capitol Hill team will be awarded the Joan Shorenstein Barone award tonight at the Radio and Television Correspondents awards for their reporting on sexual harassment in the political sphere.

articles.title: New Dems are more diverse than ever, GOP more white and male
articles.description: It's picture day at the Capitol and Chuck's obsessed with the difference in diversity between new Democrats and new Republican members.

articles.title: Lewandowski on Trump reelection: 'Stronger with Republicans than he's ever been'

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Voters want change but is Washington listening?
articles.description: Chuck and the MTP Daily panel discuss what could happen if both Democrats and Republicans ignore the change that voters mobilized for in the midterms.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: How do Democrats beat Donald Trump in 2020?

articles.title: Trump’s tax cuts and the impact nearly a year later

articles.title: Dems won big in the midterms, now what?

articles.title: New deficit figures mark a fitting end to the Tea Party era

articles.content: The U.S. budget deficit for the last fiscal year, which ended in September, was $779 billion, up 16% from the previous year. That deficit was the fifth largest in modern American history – in non-inflation adjusted terms – and stood at 3.9% of GDP, up from 3.… [+2542 chars]
